00043 template <class Component>
00044 TComponentWrap<Component>::~TComponentWrap()
00045 {
00046        ICompositeComponent* parentPtr = const_cast<ICompositeComponent*>(BaseClass::GetParentComponent(true));
00047        if (parentPtr != NULL){
00048               parentPtr->OnSubcomponentDeleted(this);
00049        }
00050 
00051        this->SetComponentContext(NULL, NULL, false);
00052 }
00053 
00054 
00055 // pseudo-reimplemented (icomp::IComponent)
00056 
00057 template <class Component>
00058 void TComponentWrap<Component>::SetComponentContext(
00059                      const IComponentContext* contextPtr,
00060                      const ICompositeComponent* parentPtr,
00061                      bool isParentOwner)
00062 {
00063        if (BaseClass::GetComponentContext() != NULL){
00064               BaseClass::OnComponentDestroyed();
00065        }
00066 
00067        BaseClass::SetComponentContext(contextPtr, parentPtr, isParentOwner);
00068 
00069        if (contextPtr != NULL){
00070               BaseClass::InitStaticInfo(this);
00071 
00072               BaseClass::OnComponentCreated();
00073        }
00074 }
